nodes.text: The Peddlers were a criminal group active on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. Around 1 ABY, Royal Naboo Security Forces Lieutenant Khartoor tasked her agents to attack Peddlers near Theed in order to gather information about the escaped murderer Hunnos Jarkey.

The Peddlers appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Peddlers were added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
